column2: "Afei nna ɔhen David ayɛ akɔdaa a oedzi mfe pii; ɔwɔ mu dɛ wɔdze atam kataa no do
column3: naaso no ho annyɛ no hyew."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi no nkowaa see no dɛ
column3: Wɔnhwehwɛ ababaawa ɔbaabun bi mbrɛ mo wura ɔhen: na ɔmbɔsom no
column4: na onyiayia no; na ɔnda no bo mu
column5: ma mo wura ɔhen no ho nyɛ no hyew."

column2: "Nna wɔkɔhwehwɛɛ akataasia fɛɛfɛw bi wɔ Israel asaase nyinara mu
column5: na wɔdze no brɛɛ ɔhen no."

column2: "Na akataasia no no ho yɛ fɛw dodow; na oyiayiaa ɔhen no
column3: na ɔsoom no; naaso ɔhen no ammfa no ho annka no."

column2: "Nna Hagit ba Adonija memaa noho do
column4: Mara na mibedzi hen; na ɔhyehyɛɛ ntseaseanam na mpɔnkɔdofo
column5: na mbarimba eduonum a wɔyɛ n'abrampɔfo."

column2: "Na n'egya annka n'enyim aber biara annse dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ayɛ dɛm yi? Nna ɔno so yɛ nyimpa fɛɛfɛw; nna ɔno nye Absalom n'ekyir ba."

column2: "Na ɔnye Zeruia ba Joab
column3: na ɔsɔfo Abiathar na wotuu egyina: na wodzii n'ekyir boaa no."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo Zadok
column7: na David ne mbarimba akatakyi no dze

column2: "Na Adonija kunkum nguan na anantwi na mbowa a wɔadodɔ seradze wɔ Zohelet ɔbo a ɔwɔ En-rogel nkyɛn no ho; na ɔtoo nsa frɛfrɛɛ no nuanom ɔhen ne mba no nyinara
column3: na ɔhen no nkowaa Juda mbarimba no nyinara:"

column2: "naaso nkɔnhyɛnyi Natan
"Nna Natan kaa kyerɛɛ Solomon ne na Bat-seba
column4: Ana ɔwo enntsee dɛ Hagit ne ba Adonija ridzi hen a hɛn wura David nnyim ho hwee bi a?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column6: ma edze agye wankasa woho nkwa

column2: "Kɔ na kɛhɛn ɔhen David nkyɛn
column6: na ekaa ntam kyerɛɛ w'afonabaa dɛ
column7: Ampaara me ba Solomon ara na obedzi hen wɔ m'ekyir
column8: na ɔnoara na ɔbɛtsena m'ahengua do no bi a? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na afei Adonija ridzi hen yi?"

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: aber a ɔwo nye ɔhen da ho rekasa wɔ hɔ no
column5: na mabɛhyɛ wo nsɛm no ma."

column2: "Na Bat-seba kɔr ɔhen no nkyɛn wɔ pia mu; na ɔhen no ayɛ akɔdaa dodow; na Abisag
"Na Bat-seba bɔɔ no mu adze
column3: na ɔyɛɛ ɔhen no enyidzi. Na ɔhen no see dɛ

column2: "Na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: ɔwoara dze EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn kaa ntam kyerɛɛ w'afonabaa dɛ
column5: Ampaara wo ba Solomon ara na obedzi hen wɔ w'ekyir
column6: na ɔnoara na ɔbɛtsena m'ahengua do."

column2: "Na afei
"na oekuku anantwi na mbowa a wɔadɔ seradze na nguan piigyan
column3: na ɔato nsa afrɛfrɛ ɔhen ne mbabanyin no nyinara
column5: na dɔm safohen panyin Joab: naaso w'akowaa Solomon dze ɔammfrɛ no."

column2: "Na ɔwo
column4: na Israel nyinara enyi da wo do dɛ ebɛkyerɛ hɔn nyia ɔbɛtsena w'ahengua do wɔ w'ekyir."

column2: "Ɔno ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: aber a mo wura ɔhen nye n'egyanom bɔkɔ akɛda no
column4: wobobu emi na me ba Solomon ndzebɔnyɛfo."

column2: "Na
column4: mber a ɔda ho nye ɔhen no rekasa no

column2: "Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ ɔhen no
column5: nkɔnhyɛnyi Natan aba wo hɔ. Na aber a odur ɔhen n'enyim no
column6: ɔbɔɔ no mu adze dze n'enyim boom famu wɔ ɔhen n'enyim."

column2: "Natan bisaa dɛ
column5: Adonija na ondzi hen wɔ w'ekyir
column6: na ɔno na ɔntsena w'ahengua do a?"

column2: "Na oesian kɔ ndɛ da yi
column3: na oekuku anantwi na mbowa a wɔadodɔ seradze na nguan piigyan
column4: na ɔato nsa afrɛfrɛ ɔhen ne mbabanyin no

column2: "Na emi
"Ana adze yi mo wura ɔhen na ɔyɛe
column3: na annda no edzi annkyerɛ wo nkowaa nyia ɔbɛtsena mo wura ɔhen n'ahengua do wɔ n'ekyir a?"

column2: "Nna ɔhen David buaa dɛ
column3: Wɔmfrɛ Bat-seba mma me. Na ɔbaa ɔhen no n'enyim

column2: "Na ɔhen kaa ntam see dɛ
column3: Dɛ EWURADZE a oyii me kra fii ahohiahia nyinara mu tse ase yi
column9: Ampa wo ba Solomon ara na obedzi hen wɔ m'ekyir
column10: na ɔnoara na ɔbɛtsena m'ahengua do wɔ m'ananmu no; nyew
column11: dɛmara na mebɛyɛ no ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Nna Bat-seba bɔɔ no mu adze dze n'enyim boom famu
column3: na ɔyɛɛ ɔhen no enyidzi na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Wɔmma mo wura ɔhen David ntsena ase daa."

column2: "Na ɔhen David see dɛ
column5: na Jehoiada ne ba Benaia mma me. Na wɔbaa ɔhen no enyim."

column2: "Na ɔhen no see hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom mfa hom wura no nkowaa no nka hom ho
column4: na wɔmma me ba Solomon ntsena mankasa m'asoasopɔnkɔ do

column2: "na wɔmma ɔsɔfo Zadok na nkɔnhyɛnyi Natan nsera no wɔ hɔ nhyɛ no hen wɔ Israel do: na hom mbɔ abɛn no mu nse dɛ
"Na nkyii hom ndzi n'ekyir mfow mbra
column3: na ɔmbra mbɛtsena m'ahengua do; na ɔno na ondzi hen wɔ m'ananmu: na mahyɛ no dɛ ɔnyɛ ɔpanyin wɔ Israel na Juda do."

column2: "Na Jehoiada ne ba Benaia buaa ɔhen no na ɔsee dɛ
column4: mo wura ɔhen ne Nyankopɔn no so nse dɛmara."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE nye mo wura ɔhen tsenae no
column3: mekyerɛ dɛmara so na ɔnye Solomon ntsena
column4: na ɔmma n'ahengua nyɛ kɛse nsen mo wura ɔhen David n'ahengua."

column2: "Nna ɔsɔfo Zadok
column7: na wɔmaa Solomon tsenaa ɔhen David n'asoasopɔnkɔ do

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo Zadok faa ngo ambɛn no wɔ Buw no mu
column3: na ɔdze bɛseraa Solomon. Na wɔhɛɛn abɛn no; na ɔman no nyinara see dɛ

column2: "Na ɔman no nyinara dzii n'ekyir fowee bae
column5: ma hɔn dede no maa asaase wosowee."

column2: "Na Adonija na n'aponto asefo no a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn no nyinara tsee wɔ aber a wowiee edzidzi no. Na aber a Joab tsee abɛn no ndze no
column4: Kurow no mu dede yi a ayɛ dɛ abɔ ebutuw yi ase nye dɛn?"

column2: "Mber a ɔda ho rekasa no
column4: ɔsɔfo Abiathar ne ba Jonatan bae: na Adonija see dɛ
column5: Bra dan mu; na ɔwo yɛ nyimpa a efata

column2: "Na Jonatan buae see Adonija dɛ
column3: Nokwar hɛn wura ɔhen David ahyɛ Solomon hen:"

column2: "na ɔhen dze ɔsɔfo Zadok
column5: na Keretfo na Peletfo no aka noho egya no kwan
column6: na wɔama ɔatsena ɔhen n'asoasopɔnkɔ no do:"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo Zadok na nkɔnhyɛnyi Natan asera no ahyɛ no hen wɔ Gihon: na wɔdze enyigye dze fi hɔ afow aba
column3: ma kurow no wosoow bio. Iyi nye dede no a hom atse no."

column2: "Na eso Solomon tse ahendzi ahengua no do."
"Na nkyii so ɔhen no nkowaa no baa behyiraa hɛn wura ɔhen David
column4: Wo Nyankopɔn mma Solomon ne dzin nyɛ yie nsen wo dzin
column5: na ɔmma n'ahengua nyɛ kɛse nsen w'ahengua: na ɔhen bɔɔ no mu adze wɔ mpa no do."

column2: "Na eso mbrɛ ɔhen no see nye yi
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn no a ɔama obi atsena m'ahengua do ndɛ da yi

column2: "Na Adonija n'aponto asefo no nyinara suroi
column3: na wɔsoɛrsoɛree na nyimpa biara faa no kwan kɔree."

column2: "Na Adonija suroi wɔ Solomon ntsi; na ɔsoɛree kosuoo afɔrmbukyia no ne mmbɛn mu."
"Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Solomon
column7: oekosuo afɔrmbukyia no ne mmbɛn mu
column9: Wɔmma ɔhen Solomon ndzi kan nka ntam nkyerɛ me ndɛ da yi dɛ ɔnnkɛfa afona eku n'akowaa."

column2: "Na Solomon see dɛ
column3: Sɛ ɔnoara kyerɛ dɛ ɔyɛ nyimpa a ɔfata a
column4: no nhwi bi ronntɔ famu: na sɛ wohu emumuyɛ wɔ no mu dze a

column2: "Nna ɔhen Solomon somae ma wɔkɛfaa no fii afɔrmbukyia no ho sianee bae. Na ɔbae na ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔhen Solomon enyidzi: na Solomon see no dɛ
